Author: colazerocultleader
Text: what helps me is to stop restricting and to think about what I crave because perhaps my body needs some nutrient. if it persists I let my body eat whatever whenever without counting and try not to care about it and eventually I really don't. in my case I usually binge because my head is messed up so the mental break really helps. you can try this too if you are interested. I wish you the best luck. it's terrible when you are in this phase
